title: Query-Reduction Networks for Question Answering
abstract: We present Query-Regression Network (QRN), a variant of Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) that is suitable for end-to-end machine comprehension. While previous work largely relied on external memory and attention mechanism, QRN is a single recurrent unit with internal memory. Unlike most RNN-based models, QRN is able to effectively handle long-term dependencies and is highly parallelizable. In our experiments we show that QRN outperforms the state of the art in end-to-end bAbI QA tasks.
